percussionEnsembles.title: A Cantiga
percussionEnsembles.description: For large percussion ensemble. Commissioned by the Spring High School Percussion Ensemble for their 2023 Midwest Clinic Performance.
percussionEnsembles.video: <iframe width="300" height="300" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PSmDvUNv064?si=Xu-n0qZ2o_F3XjvK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

percussionEnsembles.title: Sky Music
percussionEnsembles.description: For low brass and percussion ensemble. Commissioned by the Cedar Ridge Low Brass Ensemble for their Midwest Clinic performance. Also performed at TMEA.
percussionEnsembles.video: <iframe width="300" height="300" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Sax2YQHyd8o?si=dE3pQLbtEu1ftRj-&start=277" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

percussionEnsembles.title: Into the Blue
percussionEnsembles.description: For percussion ensemble. Commissioned by the Roma High School Percussion Ensemble for their taping and performance at PASIC.
percussionEnsembles.video: <iframe width="300" height="300" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DY-3y5as4-Q?si=8OwfquuQpr-uJywL&start=277" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

percussionEnsembles.title: Brightly Shining
percussionEnsembles.description: For percussion ensemble. Commissioned by the Spring High School Percussion Ensemble for their performance at Midwest Clinic in 2010.
percussionEnsembles.linkText: Available for purchase at JW Pepper
